name: Sentai Survivors
description:
Sentai Survivor

Description

During fights of the saviors of mankind, the Super Mechaiger, those who doesn't answer to the Weekly Monster Warning can end up perishing during the heroes' struggle to make justice prevail.

Survive this battle to tell your grandchildren of these feats and how it happened up close.


Controls

Left and right arrows move.
Space jumps.


This game was made using Godot, an engine we decided to try out during the jam itself. We hope you guys enjoy the results. :)

other tools used:
3ds max, Photoshop, DragonBones, Blender
